diagnosis.final_diagnosis: 46,XX monozygotic twins with genital ambiguity, one XX male and one with Ovotesticular Disorder of Sex Development (OT-DSD)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Both twins had a 46,XX karyotype with SRY gene absent in both peripheral leukocytes and gonadal tissues. Twin A demonstrated male characteristics, including a phallus with chordee and bilateral testes, while Twin B exhibited features of OT-DSD with genital ambiguity and a left gonad classified as an ovotestis. Hormonal evaluations further supported the distinct diagnoses.
